title: Doctors’ Protest blocks Town Hall
body_lines: A protest was held by doctors in Colombo today, demanding the supply of continuous medicines and surgical equipment supplies and against action by law enforcement authorities to control their unions.
Doctors were protesting in Colombo, asking for continuous medical supply and against union control by laws imposed.
The Government Medical Officers' Association (GMOA) declared a health emergency situation yesterday.
The GMOA's ongoing protest on Deans road Maradana caused heavy traffic near Town Hall. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
